website_summaries.verdict: You'll get a lot out of this super-responsive model.
pros: Four layers of high-quality cotton lining for a comfortable feel
The accompanying swivel mount is one of the easier models to install
cons: The swivel mechanism can get stuck at times

customer_reviews.title: THIS SPEEDBAG WILL NOT STAY INFLATED
customer_reviews.text: I initially gave this a 5 star review, as the bag looked like it was well made, and would last. However this bag will not stay inflated for more than 3 or 4 days. My son used it for MMA practice and I find myself hooking up the compressor all too frequently. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T

customer_reviews.title: do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Who among us has not made a poor purchase on line. I sure have had my fair share. This product is one of worst ever. While the bag is decent, the swivel is totally useless. You could probably do a burpee in between each bounce. I even spent $15.00 and bought a ball specific pressure gauge to make sure I have inflated the bag to 6psi as recommended by the company staff. It does not bounce at a rate that can be used for its intent.
customer_reviews.author: Shahram Milani

customer_reviews.title: Absolute junk
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought wouldn’t hold air so I exchanged it for an identical replacement and it won’t hold air either.
customer_reviews.author: M. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Very nice speed bag
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly & exactly as described. Nice feel, nice size, very happy with this bag!
customer_reviews.author: James A. Odden

customer_reviews.title: Pretty upset with this actually
customer_reviews.text: Pretty upset with this actually, I set it up and popped 2 of the 4 rivets that hold the strap in place. The other 2 broke as I was trying to fix the first ones. It took me a while to unlace the bag to be able to get my rivet tool inside to secure them, really poor design on this. The bag itself is good and now that its fixed, its works well. but if you are an experienced boxer you'll punch this clean off the swivel...
customer_reviews.author: Mindful_Gus

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Haven't put a ton of hours on it, but it's holding up well. Included swivel works great for my use.
customer_reviews.author: MichAl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Wow. What a great product. High quality and durable. Definitely worth the price. Would definitely purchase again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Working mama

customer_reviews.title: Works great and good quality
customer_reviews.text: There are many different punching bags but so far very happy with the quick!
customer_reviews.author: Adan

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to all beginners as well as professions in ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected. My 7 year old son loves it! The shipping was fast and secure. I will order again from this company. very reliable. This bag is tough. I would recommend this to all beginners as well as professions in my island.
customer_reviews.author: Russel

customer_reviews.title: how to keep inflated?
customer_reviews.text: This bag will not stay inflated. We have to pump it up every couple of days. Is there a trick to make it stay inflated?
customer_reviews.author: Nurse diane

customer_reviews.title: Striking bag
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but too small, should have ordered a larger bag.
customer_reviews.author: Righteous Fan

customer_reviews.title: High quality speed bag for affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Great speed bag. Not only looks sharp, but is fast and has good rebound.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: New user
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for me. I’m new at this but I’m get better.
customer_reviews.author: scott matthews

customer_reviews.title: Amazing workout!!
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely excited to get this up! I have the boxing bag outside and this inside! The quality is outstanding! Would definitely buy again if I need to!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S.

customer_reviews.title: Swivel sucks
customer_reviews.text: The swivel sucks its noisy beyond belief the most annoying noise it doesnt make it for the first few days the bag itself is durable
customer_reviews.author: Crystal  Ishmael

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made product
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made product. The hook is plastic and it snapped the first day he used it. I bought it as a gift, and it was a huge waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime V

customer_reviews.title: Quality and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I have had the bag for a couple months and the quality of the bag is very good. It was easy to install as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Husk

customer_reviews.title: Great speed bag with easy swivel mount!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, easy to set up with included swivel. Inflates with standard air pump needle. Now I speed bag in my garage whenever I want!
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag. Smooth feel. Nice, flat seams. The pin swivel seems pretty loud - or at least a lot louder than the little cheap swivel I had on it before. Otherwise, solid equipment
customer_reviews.author: Tafar

customer_reviews.title: Just OKAY!
customer_reviews.text: Speed Bag began to peel within 2 days. Construction is holding up and seems sturdy. Swivel has extremely poor functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Caesar Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Bag seems of good quality. Con is it loses air every two ...
customer_reviews.text: Bag seems of good quality. Con is it loses air every two weeks but I guess I would to if I was getting beat every day.
customer_reviews.author: cory

customer_reviews.title: Like the swivel holder that comes with it
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through a few bags most of them Everlast, but this one is holding up very well to the punishment and the heat of AZ. Like the swivel holder that comes with it. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: No hassle!
customer_reviews.text: All parts were with it and easy to set up!
customer_reviews.author: Terry A Stewart Jr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great to use to add variety to my arm workouts.
customer_reviews.author: SRH

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I workout with this regularly and it's a quaity bag.good product I will recomend it. excellent
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Feels good and quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the rdx. feels nice and looks good
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Very professional looking.
customer_reviews.text: Hung well with included hardware. Mounted right to ceiling without anything other than what was included (I hit a stud with two screws and used anchors for the other two without an issue with use). It's holding air well and works well. Could have used better instructions on how high to hang it and the air pressure required but a few searches gave me what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: I love Amazon great to have
customer_reviews.text: Hi I got it for my son he is 44 he love it thank you
customer_reviews.author: Minnie West

customer_reviews.title: The bag is good quality, but the swivel is terrible
customer_reviews.text: The bag is good quality, but the swivel is terrible. It kinda has a mind of its own and doesn't move in a consistent pattern at all.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

product_meta.title: RDX Speed Ball Boxing Genuine Leather MMA Muay Thai Training Punching Dodge Striking Bag Kit Hanging Swivel Workout
product_meta.description: Patent Pending High quality Cow hide leather speedball set with Steel Swivel. Has an inflatable bladder inside which is pumped using a normal football pump. Tie design allows bladder to be replaced. Swivel can be fixed to any suitable surface. Comes with RDX elite swivel has a reduced centre hub for speed/balance and rhythm of ball action. Made from a high grade of stainless steel and constructed with quality bearings this allows a speedball to move freely in the direction of force thus allowing a fast and continuous strike rhythm when hit.
feature_bullets: Patent Pending Speed Ball comes with RDX elite swivel made from a high grade of stainless steel and constructed with quality bearings
Cow hide leather material is lined inside with 4 layers of poly cotton material
Each ball is individually shaped and balanced for rebound accuracy, Tough construction
Lightweight design means lightning fast rebounds, Guaranteed quality
Riveted attachment provides superior durability, Double-lined hanging strap discourages splitting
